summary:
The 2026 FIFA World Cup, called FIFA World Cup 26, will be the 23rd international men's soccer championship. It will happen from June 11 to July 19, 2026, in 16 cities across Canada, Mexico, and the United States. This is the first World Cup hosted by three countries since 1994. Argentina is the current champion.

The tournament will have 48 teams, more than before. The United 2026 bid won over Morocco's at the 68th FIFA Congress. Mexico will be the first country to host the World Cup three times. The United States last hosted in 1994, and it will be Canada's first time co-hosting. The event returns to its usual summer schedule after the 2022 edition in Qatar's winter.
title: 2026 FIFA World Cup
